BBK01.SUD238: New business (volumes) of German banks / Loans to non-financial corporations up to EUR 0.25 million with an initial rate fixation of over 3 months and up to 1 year

General: Estimated. The volume of new business is extrapolated to form the underlying total using the Horvitz-Thompson estimator. The amount refers to the single loan transaction considered as new business. p = Provisional
